Articles.Content:
GopherCraft is a group of Let's Players who often game together on servers hosted by Gopherboy. In an effort to add some fresh competition to the group I issued the "GopherCraft Great Space Challenge!" We are all pretty new to KSP but this should still be a fun challenge to play and enjoy watching.

Rules:

1. Play Kerbal Space Program in Career Mode without any mods.

2. Record our gameplay & keep track of time (Using the in game clock/calendar to help with this)

3. We can edit, cut video as needed but post in game calendar timestamps or date/time updates in our videos for competitive tracking.

4. First player to land on the mun, walk on the surface of the mun & successfully return their mission crew to Kerbin in the shortest amount of time wins. Only the crew from your succesful mun mission must be returned to win.

5. Players are allowed to play the tutorials as much as they want to increase game ability during this contest but must only use one career save for competition purposes.

6. Post at least one video per week during the contest time. Posting a successful video before everyone else doesn't necessarily make you a winner, the time/date in-game will be the deciding factor.

7. Begin posting videos as soon/as often as we like but need to post our first video by the 16th of June 2014 and at least one video each week after.

8. Quicksaves are allowed but only to load if game crashes or freaks. Player's poor design or implementation doesn't get them a do over. You mess up, you leave it in.
